name: Virtual Reality Game World
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en: VRG offer to users Move to Earn✅, Watch to Earn 🔥, Race to Earn✅, Fight to Earn✅, NFTs market place🔥 and multi-chain crypto wallet✅. Buy/Sell/Swap/Transfer tokens or NFTs by using our own platform/Wallet🔥. VR Wallet & VRG Earn already live in play store✅. User can earn VRGW from VRG earn app⚡️. Also can Earn High yield APY% from stake🔥. Officially Partner with Binance Listed Nuls✅. Also partnered with gate.io, mexc, houbi listed project.⚡️
